Trade/Device Name(s): cobas® Influenza A/B & RSV Nucleic Acid Test for Use on the cobas® Liat System
cobas® Influenza A/B & RSV Quality Control Kit
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for cobas® Influenza A/B & RSV automated multiplex RT-PCR assay for detection of Influenza A, Influenza B, and RSV using the cobas® Liat System
Indications for Use Summary: Automated multiplex real-time RT-PCR assay for rapid qualitative detection and discrimination of Influenza A virus, Influenza B virus, and RSV RNA in nasopharyngeal swab specimens from patients with signs and symptoms of respiratory infection, as an aid in diagnosis and differentiation in humans, for use on the cobas® Liat System
